gate.learning

Class EvaluationMeasuresComputation

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.learning.EvaluationMeasuresComputation

  • public class EvaluationMeasuresComputation
extends Object
    Store the results for computing the F-measures for binary classification problem (or one label of multi-class problems). The measures include precision, recall and F1. It has exact results as well as lenient results counting partial matches.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      float correct
      Number of exact matches.
      float f1
      F1 for exact matches.
      float f1Lenient
      F1 for exact and partial matches.
      float missing
      Number of positive instances missed by the system.
      float partialCor
      Number of only partial matches.
      float precision
      Precision for exact matches.
      float precisionLenient
      Precision for exact and partial matches.
      float recall
      Recall for exact matches.
      float recallLenient
      Recall for exact and partial matches.
      float spurious
      Number of instances incorrectly with predicted label.
